entries.title: FTX Investigating Possible $515 Million Hack After Bankruptcy Filing
entries.description: Researchers documented $515 million in suspicious transfers from the cryptocurrency exchange.

entries.title: Internal Documents Show How Close the F.B.I. Came to Deploying Spyware
entries.description: Christopher Wray, the F.B.I.’s director, told Congress last December that the bureau purchased the phone hacking tool Pegasus for research purposes.
